item.title: Backup and Restore
item.description: Backup and restore Kubernetes uses Etcd as the key-value store for its resource definitions. Gardener supports the backup and restore of etcd. It is the responsibility of the shoot owners to backup the workload data. Gardener uses etcd-backup-restore component to backup the etcd backing the Shoot cluster regularly and restore in case of disaster. It is deployed as sidecar via etcd-druid. This doc mainly focuses on the backup and restore configuration used by Gardener when deploying these components.
